title: Adele 'sheds three stone' as she shows off weight loss at Drake's bash
text:
Adele is said to have lost three stone (Picture: FilmMagic)

Adele is said to have dropped a whopping three stone after showing off her weight loss at Drake’s party.

The 31-year-old recently stunned in a black dress as she celebrated her fellow musician’s birthday.

And now it’s been reported by The Mirror that she has managed to shed the weight following her split from her ex-husband Simon Koneki.

The publication claimed that the star looked ‘incredible after losing an impressive three stone.’

And it seems even the singer herself addressed her new look when posting a glam photo from the evening to her social media.

She said ‘I used to cry but now I sweat’ (Picture: Getty Images)

Sharing the moment with her Instagram followers, the Rumour Has It hitmaker wrote in the caption: ‘I used to cry but now I sweat.’

This comes following reports from The Sun, who said the pop star had been taking up fitness classes alongside her good friend Ayda Field.

Earlier this year, a source said: ‘Adele has been out enjoying herself and she sees that as her priority at the moment, along with being a mum to Angelo.

‘She has been loving her new workout regime and it really works for her.’

The star divorced her ex-husband earlier this year (Picture: WireImage)

They added: ‘It’s a bonus that she has shifted some weight. Her mates are glad she’s letting loose and there’s nothing but good feelings towards her.

‘She’s got a new lease of life.’

Adele hasn’t walked a red carpet or taken to the stage in some time, as the mum-of-one has been taking time away from the spotlight to be with her son.

In September this year, Adele filed for divorce on Thursday – five months after they announced their split.

The singer began dating Simon in 2011 and welcomed their son, Angelo, in 2012.

They tied the knot in a secret 2016 ceremony, with Adele publicly addressing the wedding for the first time during an acceptance speech at the 2017 Grammys.
